title: urljsf
description: A schema for building forms for building URLs for building...

iframe.description: isolate each form on the page in an `iframe`

iframe_style.description: additional simple CSS to apply to an `iframe` element (implies `iframe`)

any-file-format.title: File Format
any-file-format.description: a format that can be serialized or deserialized

any-schema-location.title: A Schema Location
any-schema-location.description: a path to a JSON schema, serialized as JSON, TOML, or (simple) YAML.

any-theme.title: Theme
any-theme.description:
a name of a theme supported by a compatible version of `urljsf`.

all [bootswatch] themes are available, with the vanilla [`bootstrap`][bs5] by default.

[bs5]: https://getbootstrap.com/docs/5.0
[bootswatch]: https://bootswatch.com

any-url-template.title: URL Template
any-url-template.description:
a [nunjucks]-compatible template.

The [jinja compatibility layer][jinjacompat] is enabled, allowing for more expressive,
python-like syntax.

[nunjucks]: https://mozilla.github.io/nunjucks
[jinjacompat]: https://mozilla.github.io/nunjucks/api.html#installjinjacompat

file-form.title: File Form
file-form.description: a description of a form that builds a data file

url-form.title: URL Form
url-form.description: a definition of a form to build a URL
